attr.title: Spellworm
attr.desc: Help Spellworm to eat his way through over 100-word search puzzles, chomping through different themes, including shapes, colours, countries, planets and much more.
attr.inst: Purchase the full game at itch.io (https://ci.itch.io/spellworm). Download and extract the .zip, and copy the game files to this port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the full game at [itch.io](https://ci.itch.io/spellworm). Download and extract the *.zip*, and copy the game files to this port's *gamedata* folder.
